arts.ttl: "A game of patience" – Kimmich reflects on Bayern's win over Gladbach
arts.sum: After Bayern’s 3-0 win over Borussia Mönchengladbach, Joshua Kimmich described thematch as “a game of patience.”

arts.ttl: European football: Bayern’s lucky 13 as Kimmich breaks down 10-man Gladbach
arts.sum: Kimmich, Guerreiro and Karl capitalise on Castrop red card Bundesliga leaders have won 13 from 13 in all competitions Bayern Munich needed more than an hour before breaking the resistance of Borussia Mönchengladbach, to earn a 3-0 victory over opponents who spent more than 75% of the game with 10 men. It was the Bundesliga leaders’ 13th win in 13 matches across all competitions this season. Joshua Kimmich slotted in after 64 minutes and the substitute Raphaël Guerreiro added another five minutes later before the teenager Lennart Karl, who had scored in their Champions League win over Club Brugge on Wednesday, made it 3-0 in the 81st. Bayern have a maximum 24 points from eight league matches, five ahead of RB Leipzig, 6-0 winners at Augsburg. This story will be updated Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Eugen Polanski and Gladbach not shying away from Bayern Munich challenge
arts.sum: During his time as a player for Gladbach, Mainz and Hoffenheim, Polanski plied his trade under notable names such as Jupp Heynckes, Thomas Tuchel and Julian Nagelsmann . "I’ve always said that the great luck in my career was having very good coaches," Polanski explained.

arts.ttl: Kompany confirms Urbig will be in goal for Bayern against Gladbach
arts.sum: Bayern coach Vincent Kompany has confirmed that Jonas Urbig will replace Manuel Neuer in goal against Borussia Mönchengladbach.

arts.ttl: Urbig to replace Neuer in goal for Bayern against Gladbach?
arts.sum: According to Bild, Jonas Urbig is expected to get a rare start for Bayern Munich against Borussia Mönchengladbach.
